content: A boutique hotel unlike any other in NYC, WestHouse Hotel New York is an entirely new concept in luxury hospitality, a true “house away from home” where a curated portfolio of services and hotel amenities transcends the norm. From fashion and luxury lifestyle trend-setters including  DayNa Decker and Sleep | Studio, we have partnered with only the best to create a purely exclusive yet welcoming experience. Purposefully designed to have a fluid, residential feel, guests check-in just once and for the remainder of their stay enjoy #InResidence privileges ranging from culinary delicacies to signature libations.
